{{Description|You know [[Xiangling]], from [[Wanmin Restaurant]]? The celebrity chef from [[Liyue]] who's always on the lookout for novel ingredients.<br />Well, she was talking about how this underground spiral place must contain a load of goodies you'd never find up here on the surface...<br />It seems she waited till we weren't looking and snuck inside.<br />She's gone deeper than we can get to.<br />So maybe you could bring her back?<br />There's no rush, though, a chef like her would never let herself go hungry.}}
'''Spiral Abyss Event - People's Choice''' is a Permanent [[Event]] in [[Version 1.0]].

==Duration==
No time limit.

==Requirements==
Reach [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above

==Reward==
Complete Floor 3, Chamber 3 of the Spiral Abyss Challenge to win "Exquisite Delicacy" [[Xiangling]] ({{Pyro}})!<ref>Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1310580018611924994 Event Announcement]</ref>

You can only win the reward for this event once. The event page will close once you have completed the challenge.
{{Card|Xiangling}}
